mapper.select: SELECT A.FREE_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.FREE_TITLE, A.FREE_CREATE_DATE, A.FREE_HIT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, FREE_NO, NICKNAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CREATE_DATE, FREE_HIT FROM FREE_BRD) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BRD (NICKNAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, FREE_CREATE_DATE, FREE_MODIFY_DATE, FREE_IP, FREE_HIT) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContent}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d%h%i'), #{freeIp}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BRD SET FREE_TITLE = #{freeTitle}, FREE_CONTENT = #{freeContent}, FREE_MODIFY_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d%h%i') WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo}
